name: Google Surface 3D Light Mode Neomorphism UI
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Release Version of Light Mode Google Surface. Google Surface is a neumorphism / neomorphic redesign of Google search which incorporates shadows and gradients. Neumorphic / Neomorphic panels cover the site and make it feel 3D. This theme is the ultimate modern redesign of Google Light. ----- Report all errors and issues to RG form https://forms.office.com/r/sAYTdrg8wn
